name: Spaceman Jasper
dialogue:
Do you have any lightning glass? 
I have rice to trade.

: 
There's nothing like a spacewalk 
in the morning.

name: Spaceman Sam
dialogue:
Do you have any interesting fossils? 
I make the best spaghetti sauce, but 
I don’t give it to strangers for free.

: 
If anyone asks, I'm not out here.

name: Spaceman Nyckolle
dialogue:
Salsa is my jam! I’ll trade you some 
for something sparkly from the 
snow planet!

: 
Have you looked at all the plants?

name: Spaceman Kun
dialogue:
Have you been to the Volcano planet? 
I hear they have beautiful rocks there.

: 
Did you end up cooking something nice?

name: Gardener
dialogue:
Check this out! Plants are amazing, 
aren’t they?
What a lovely day for gardening!

name: Fitness Fanatic
dialogue:
I always sneak into the kitchen for 
extra gains. Shh, don’t tell anyone!
Whoa, that butter gave you killer biceps!!

name: Cadet
dialogue:
Want these? I got an extra bag at the 
commissary.
You can never have too many Tortillas.

name: Head Chef
dialogue: Hello, Sous Chef!
What's cooking?

name: Information Center Liaison
dialogue:
Do you need a GPS? They can be used 
to navigate to different planets.

Traveling to distant planets can be 
dangerous. Be careful!

name: Lab Technician
dialogue:
Did you know the ship’s tofu 
is lab-grown?

Tofu is delicious, no matter where it 
came from.

name: Shadowy Figure
dialogue:
Get me some Snacks and I'll give you 
a reward.

Mmm... stolen Snacks always taste 
the best.

name: Pod Technician
dialogue:
I found this key on the floor. 
You can take it.
I think that's the bathroom key.

name: Random Alien
dialogue:
Have you ever tried the local 
hot springs?

I'm not saying I'm an expert on volcanoes, 
but I do have a PhD in lava dodging.

name: Spacewalker Felix
dialogue:
I have a pet mosquito named Buzz. 
He's a real pain in the neck, 
but he's loyal.

I once wrestled an alligator. It was a 
draw, but I think he let me win.

name: Desert Alien
dialogue:
Hello, Spacewalker, I don't always drink 
water, but when I do, I prefer it 
with a side of sand.

Hello, Spacewalker, I tried to make a 
sandcastle once, but it just turned into a 
pile of sand. Oops!

name: Lava Monster
dialogue: Hello, Spacewalker
mwahahaha
riddles:
I am hot and molten, and reside underneath the Earth's crust. 
What am I?  (1) Magma (2) Choice (3) Choice

name: Vine Monster
dialogue: Hello, Spacewalker
mwahahaha
riddles:
I am a spotted cat and I do not roar. 
I live on the forest floor and in the understory. 
What am I? (1) Jaguar (2) Choice (3) Choice

name: Ice Monster
dialogue: Hello, Spacewalker
mwahahaha

name: Sand Monster
dialogue: Hello, Spacewalker
mwahahaha
riddles:
What is a name for a natural satellite? 
 (1) Moon (2) Sun (3) Earth
